revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-880L |revision=A1 |asin=B00J8NCVX4;US; |fcc_date=02/17/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Alpha Networks |manuf_model=WRT-AC18 |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IR880LA1 |ic_id=4216A-IR880LA1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4708A0;BCM4708A0, TT1342 P10, 326998-01 B1C; |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G100TFI00 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6GD16EWXC-15H |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG, TE1341 P20, 324386 3 W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG, TE1341 P20, 324386 3 W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4 GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;SKY, 2623L, 34<..>;3; ,,, 5 GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;5003L1, 3426W, 1342, MY;3; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=Admin |oui=70:62:B8 |oui_eth=70:62:B8 }} {{TagLine|Wireless AC1900 Dual Band Gigabit Cloud Router}} :[http://us.dlink.com/products/connect/ac1900-wi-fi-router/ Product page] (US)
It would seem '''D-Link''' is jumping on the 'big AC1900 router<!-- w/ external antennas-->' bandwagon :along with [[ASUS RT-AC68U]], [[Netgear R7000]], and [[Linksys EA6900]] :<small>(+ [[Linksys WRT1900AC]], I guess)</small>. <!-- the more the merrier.. -->
The internal '''Alpha''' model for this device may be '''WRT-AC18'''.
{{WiFiCert|WFA53472|04/01/2014}}
===Reviews=== *[http://smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32500-d-link-dir-880l-ac1900-wi-fi-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :70:62:B8 OUI *[http://www.shadowandy.net/2014/11/d-link-dir-880l-wireless-ac1900-dual-band-gigabit-cloud-router.htm On '''ShadowAndy'''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4708A @800 MHz DualCore :RAM: 256 MB (DDR3), Flash: 128 MB (NAND) :Radio 2.4 GHz [[Broadcom]] BCM4360 3T3R 802.11bgn ::''Skyworks'' SE2623L 2.4 GHz Power Amplifier (x3) :Radio 5 GHz [[Broadcom]] BCM4360 3T3R 802.11an/ac ::''Skyworks'' SE5003L1 5.0 GHz Power Amplifier (x3) :Switch: [[Broadcom]] BCM4708A 1x GbE (WAN) + 4x GbE (LAN) *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/dlink/d-link-dir-880l-ac1900-r235/ On '''Openitforum''']
===Chip product pages=== *[http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4707-4708-4709 ''BCM4707/BCM4708/BCM4709'' product page @ '''Broadcom'''] *[http://www.etron.com/en/search/search.php?source=partno&search_01=EM6GD16EWXC ''EM6GD16EWXC'' product search @ '''EtronTech''']
==Probable used PSU== The power supply shown in the FCC external photos is an :'''Asian Power Devices''' WA-36C12R.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand=Asian Power Devices |model=WA-36C12R |input_v=100-240 |input_a= |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=3 |output_conn=barrel |e_level= |style=large, vertical |manuf_country=China }}
